resources.string:
Overview: Test your Star Trek knowledge across all series (up to a year ago). Race against time, answer correctly, and rack up points. Learn about timer, scoring, and lifeline mechanics in the following sections.
Star Trek Series: Read questions faster by recognizing short forms for each Star Trek series. TOS: The Original Series TAS: The Animated Series TNG: The Next Generation DS9: Deep Space Nine VOY: Voyager ENT: Enterprise DIS: Discovery PIC: Picard LD: Lower Decks PRO: Prodigy SNW: Strange New Worlds SA: Starfleet Academy
